title: Why am I in the leaver queue?
body:
Alright so I know I’ll have to waste more than a hour of my life to get out of this queue but why am I in it?
Played a game of Vi jungle and now I’m in the leaver queue????? What???

replies.body: Hey there, your account can obtain a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalty if it has a history of leaves.  It won't happen over just 1 game, but a consistently.  Your best bet to remove this is by playing through your lower priority games without further occurrences.
I didn’t know it did that. Thanks!
